channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly Tip - Top of Aggs Hill on Right Hand Side, 19th October
item.description:
The fly tip is located on the Right Hand Side going towards the Burnt Oak Crossroads and about 20 yards from the Cotswold Way Gate. It is under the trees near the wall and is difficult to see due to it being both dark material and dark from the trees. The tip is a wall cabinet together with other rubbish. Please can it be collected up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bag of Rubbish - Hit by Vehicles - now over road, 19th October
item.description:
A flytipped bag of rubbish has been hit by multple vehicles and has been strewn along both sides of Mill Lane at the location. Please can the litter created be cleaned up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain outside 102/104 Fairview Road has been blocked since May. I have reported this before but it is still blocked and there is a strong smell emanating from the drain., 19th October
item.description:
Blocked drain outside 102/104 Fairview Road GL52 2ER Possible health hazard as stinks and I have COPD and other breathing issues which are made worse by airborne or waterborne bacterial infections. Please could I ask that this drain be cleared? Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 104, Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree needs felling, 18th October
item.description:
Prestbury Parish Council conducted a tree survey of our trees on Robson Field and the report highlighted many trees located along the brook that needed attention. One in particular was highlighted as requiring urgent work.
